newsitem.title: USA: Schawk Inc to acquire AEP Flexo assets.
newsitem.headline: Schawk Inc to acquire AEP Flexo assets.

text.p: Schawk Inc said Monday it will pay an undisclosed price to acquire the assets and liabilities of AEP Flexo Inc, a supplier of packaging industry services based in Dayton, Kentucky.
Schawk said AEP, which serves businesses in the Cincinnati area, brings a regional presence and additional capabilities in prepress digital imaging files and flexo plates.
The deal is expected to close on or about June 1, Schawk said.
Schawk is a supplier of electronic digitized high resolution color imaging, database management and on-site facility management.
Its shares closed up 1/8 Monday at 8-1/4.
